The Congresswoman has constantly advocated for the rights of working families and voiced her criticism of current US President Donald Trump’s policies. excerpt: If you're wondering about politician Rosa DeLauro's net worth in 2025, read on to learn all the details, including the sources of her income.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Netizens are eager to learn about Rosa DeLauro’s net worth in 2025. The US representative for Connecticut’s 3rd congressional district, she has made a name for herself with her long-standing and diverse career. The Congresswoman has constantly advocated for the rights of working families and voiced her criticism of current US President Donald Trump’s policies. So, here are all the details regarding DeLauro’s net worth and how much wealth she has accumulated over the years. What is Rosa DeLauro’s net worth in 2025? Rosa DeLauro has a speculated net worth of $3 million in 2025. DeLauro’s net worth in 2025 consists of earnings from her work in politics and being a US Congress representative. Rosa DeLauro is most famous for her association with the Democratic Party and getting elected for the most number of times from Connecticut’s third congressional district. What does Rosa DeLauro do for a living? Rosa DeLauro is a politician and serves as a member of the House of Representatives. Most recently, DeLauro attended Donald Trump’s congressional address and brought Connecticut’s 2025 Teacher of the Year award recipient Julia Miller with her to raise awareness about education. The Congresswoman wrote on X (formerly Twitter), “Thank you Connecticut’s 2025 Teacher of the Year Julia Miller for bravely standing with me in defense of public education today.” Rosa DeLauro’s earnings explained — how does she make money? Rosa DeLauro primarily earns money from work as a member of the House and the representative of Connecticut’s 3rd congressional district. Political Career Being a member of the House, Rosa DeLauro gets a salary of $174,000 from her work as a US representative. Apart from the salary, she also enjoys benefits like retirement plans and healthcare benefits supported by the government. Elected as the rep of the third congressional district in 1991, DeLauro has served in the same position ever since. Her portfolio further enhanced because of her work as Senator Chris Dodd’s Chief of Staff before becoming a House representative. Additionally, DeLauro worked as the executive director of EMILY’s List. Rosa DeLauro has advocated for numerous social reforms in her career. This includes helping pass the Food Safety Modernization Act and her work on the Child Tax Credit to help reduce child poverty. Moreover, DeLauro has significantly contributed to the Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education Appropriations Subcommittee. Further, Rosa DeLauro has served as the Chair of the House Appropriations Committee in 2021 and the co-chair of the Democratic Steering and Policy Committee. However, the politician also faced a decline in her net worth, which was approximately $16 million between 2008 and 2017.
html:
Netizens are eager to learn about Rosa DeLauro’s net worth in 2025. The US representative for Connecticut’s 3rd congressional district, she has made a name for herself with her long-standing and diverse career. The Congresswoman has constantly advocated for the rights of working families and voiced her criticism of current US President Donald Trump’s policies.

So, here are all the details regarding DeLauro’s net worth and how much wealth she has accumulated over the years.

What is Rosa DeLauro’s net worth in 2025?

Rosa DeLauro has a speculated net worth of $3 million in 2025.

DeLauro’s net worth in 2025 consists of earnings from her work in politics and being a US Congress representative.

Rosa DeLauro is most famous for her association with the Democratic Party and getting elected for the most number of times from Connecticut’s third congressional district.

What does Rosa DeLauro do for a living?

Rosa DeLauro is a politician and serves as a member of the House of Representatives.

Most recently, DeLauro attended Donald Trump’s congressional address and brought Connecticut’s 2025 Teacher of the Year award recipient Julia Miller with her to raise awareness about education. The Congresswoman wrote on X (formerly Twitter), “Thank you Connecticut’s 2025 Teacher of the Year Julia Miller for bravely standing with me in defense of public education today.”

Rosa DeLauro’s earnings explained — how does she make money?

Rosa DeLauro primarily earns money from work as a member of the House and the representative of Connecticut’s 3rd congressional district.

Political Career

Being a member of the House, Rosa DeLauro gets a salary of $174,000 from her work as a US representative. Apart from the salary, she also enjoys benefits like retirement plans and healthcare benefits supported by the government.

Elected as the rep of the third congressional district in 1991, DeLauro has served in the same position ever since. Her portfolio further enhanced because of her work as Senator Chris Dodd’s Chief of Staff before becoming a House representative. Additionally, DeLauro worked as the executive director of EMILY’s List.

Rosa DeLauro has advocated for numerous social reforms in her career. This includes helping pass the Food Safety Modernization Act and her work on the Child Tax Credit to help reduce child poverty. Moreover, DeLauro has significantly contributed to the Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education Appropriations Subcommittee.

Further, Rosa DeLauro has served as the Chair of the House Appropriations Committee in 2021 and the co-chair of the Democratic Steering and Policy Committee. However, the politician also faced a decline in her net worth, which was approximately $16 million between 2008 and 2017.
